amendment.description: To expand protections against wrongful discharge to sexual assault survivors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4112 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4112 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Gillibrand. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3489) To expand protections against wrongful discharge to sexual assault survivors.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4112 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Gillibrand.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4112 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
